Text: FW Unify pathing problem Cc Chris This is the response I received from IT Please review and let me know when this has been accomplished and I will retry to download in Unify Max Original Message From Harmon Kenneth M Sent Friday May PM To Doner Max Cc Dhont Margaret Yanowski Tommy J Liu Vivian Scott Larry W Subject RE Unify pathing problem Max Unify posted an update from Sitara for this Deal in Unify around am this morning When I was checking the data pretaining to this deal in the database I noticed that there is no volume data for March which is one reason why you cant produce a statement Please get your Sitara contact to ensure March pricing data and volumes data exist in their system If it does not have them enter it and repush the deal If it does simply have them repush the deal Once this is done please make sure the balancing process for this Contract is executed in Unify this is typically run by Volume Management manually during the day or by the batch job in the evening Then you should be able execute the Draft process also please doublecheck and ensure a notification record was created for this deal in Settlements and a statement should get created If you have additional questions please dont hesitate to contact me Ken Harmon work cell Original Message From Doner Max Sent Friday May PM To Harmon Kenneth M Cc Dhont Margaret Subject Unify pathing problem Ken Please have someone research a Sitara sales deal for March production that is not bridging to Unify Deal No Counterparty Midland Cogeneration Venture Limited Partnership Let me know what we might do in order to make this one work Thanks Max

RE MCV Invoicing Issuespst Chris I have prepared faxed and mailed the invoice for this deal to MCV I will try to have IT look into why this deal is not going into Unify Max Original Message From Germany Chris Sent Friday May PM To Doner Max Dhont Margaret Greif Donna Brady Kevin Cc Polsky Phil Dicarlo Louis Germany Chris Subject MCV Invoicing Issues Max Please create a manual invoice to MCV for the following item Delivery Period Mar Deal Contract Volume x days Price Pipeline PEPL Location Anadarko Pool The total amount should be Let me know if I missed something The Panhandle item for March is pathed but its not passing through to settlements Im not sure who to call about this Louis this is Phil and I have come up with on the AR balance Now this doesnt mean that we have sent out everything its always possible that an invoice was never created even though everything looks ok in the trading and scheduling systems Our March Panhandle item is a good example Amount Comment AR Balance as of April activity This is part of the manual invoice that Max will send out I believe MCV has agreed to pay this but only after we bill them Incorrect pricing for March MCVs replacement cost for MCV II that we did not serve in March Ed needs to decide if MCV has the right to do this MCV support for this and the replacement prices seem reasonable To day outstanding receivables to day outstanding receivables Pricing discrepancies for Feb production We agree with MCVs pricing Remaining AR balance after taking out the Current To and To day aging items
Sitara change for Decmeber Cc Chris I need the amount of Demand Charge for Deal no changed to from This demand charge is for fuel reimbursement Thanks Max

RE City of Tallahassee Payment for May pst Chris Tallahassee is paying us based on GD of the Zone of Receipt Max Original Message From Germany Chris Sent Wednesday June PM To Doner Max Cc Polsky Phil Subject RE City of Tallahassee Payment for May We are double checking your work and this is what I have on my swing worksheet Day May Volume GD GD Amount Total Im using the Zone gas daily Are you using a different gas daily Let me know where the differences are Also would you let me know what days we did not get the baseload gas please thx Original Message From Doner Max Sent Wednesday June AM To Polsky Phil Cc Germany Chris Dhont Margaret Cash Larry Subject City of Tallahassee Payment for May Phil Per your request enclosed is the breakdown for the payment expected from the City of Tallahassee on June th Base Volume Swing Volume Total Due Thanks Max
City of Tallahassee Payment for May Cc Phil Per your request enclosed is the breakdown for the payment expected from the City of Tallahassee on June th Base Volume Swing Volume Total Due Thanks Max

City of Tallahassee Adjustments for February Cc Chris Pam at the City of Tallahassee sent me her volume reports for February There are two adjustments that will be made to their invoice The base volume will be increased from dth to dth This will increase our supply with Dominion which I believe you have been informed by Dominion as well The Swing gas for will be reduced by to due to an operational scheduling cut from the Reliant pool The City of Tallahassee has already deducted this from their payment on the original invoice In summary I will be preparing an additional invoice to the City of Tallahassee in the amount of I will let you know when payment is received on this adjustment Dont forget my State of Florida adjustments Thanks Max

Sitara price changes for March Sept Dec for State of Floridapst Chris Enclosed is the spreadsheet I spoke with you about yesterday concerning the price changes needed in Sitara for months I appreciate your help in changing these prices Thanks Max

FW Deal extension in Sitarapst Chris The point of this sale is Entex Oxford Max Original Message From Doner Max Sent Thursday May AM To Germany Chris Cc Dhont Margaret Subject Deal extension in Sitara Chris I am trying to cleanup some AR items for Reliant Energy Entex For January I need you to enter a sales volume of dth as actual on deal no with two tiers Tier dth at TENNLAOFFSHORE IF Minus and Tier dth at TENNLAOFFSHORE IF Plus Thanks Max
Sitara price changes for December Cc PST James Please change the prices in Sitara for December as follows Deal No POI Price Thanks Max
Sitara price change for December Cc PST James Please change the following Sitara deals for December to Deal No POI Thanks Max
